public class MainScreen extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller for the Main Screen.

    • onActionAddCust

      public void onActionAddCust(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      On action add cust. This method displays the Add Customer screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event
      Throws:
      IOException - the io exception

    • onActionModCust

      public void onActionModCust(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      On action mod cust. This method displays the Modify Customer screen. It also passes the selected customer to the Modify Customer screen so the information can be populated. It also checks to ensure a customer is selected in the TableView for modification and displays and error if one is not.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event
      Throws:
      IOException - the io exception

    • onActionDeleteCust

      public void onActionDeleteCust(javafx.event.ActionEvent ignoredActionEvent) throws SQLException
      On action delete cust. This method deletes the selected customer from the database. It also checks to ensure a customer is selected for deletion and displays an error if one is not. It also deletes all appointments associated with the customer being deleted. It displays a confirmation screen before deleting the customer and a screen afterward confirming the deletion.
      Parameters:
      ignoredActionEvent - the ignored action event
      Throws:
      SQLException - the sql exception

    • onActionAddAppt

      public void onActionAddAppt(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      On action add appt. This method displays the Add Appointment screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event
      Throws:
      IOException - the io exception

    • onActionModAppt

      public void onActionModAppt(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      On action mod appt. This method displays the Modify Appointment screen. It also passes the selected appointment so that the information can be populated to the form. It checks to ensure an appointment to be modified is selected in the TableView and displays a warning if one is not.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event

    • onActionDeleteAppt

      public void onActionDeleteAppt(javafx.event.ActionEvent ignoredActionEvent) throws SQLException
      On action delete appt. This method deletes the selected appointment from the database. It also checks to ensure an appointment is selected for deletion in the TableView and displays a warning if not. It also displays a confirmation warning requiring a user to confirm deletion of the selected appointment and a screen confirming once the appointment is deleted.
      Parameters:
      ignoredActionEvent - the ignored action event
      Throws:
      SQLException - the sql exception

    • onActionReports

      public void onActionReports(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      On action reports. This method displays the reports screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event
      Throws:
      IOException - the io exception

    • onActionLogout

      public void onActionLogout(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      On action logout. This method logs the user out and displays the login screen.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the action event
      Throws:
      IOException - the io exception

    • onActionExit

      public void onActionExit(javafx.event.ActionEvent ignoredActionEvent)
      On action exit. This method exits the application.
      Parameters:
      ignoredActionEvent - the ignored action event
